title: Limitless Mathematicians Program
description: Selected for the prestigious 'Limitless Mathematicians' program at ADA University for two consecutive years. In the first year, mastered Geometry, Number Theory, and Advanced Algorithms under the mentorship of Prof. Yagub Aliyev, securing 3rd place in the final evaluations. In the second year, expanded expertise into Cryptography and Probability, guided by a team of ADA professors including Samir and Rafael alongside Prof. Aliyev, achieving an improved ranking of 2nd place. The program focused on high-level mathematical reasoning, complex problem-solving, and the application of abstract theories to computational challenges.
